column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Debating between 3 and 4 stars because this place is corporate
column2: but Ba-Ba-Reeba is key for large groups and taking visitors.  You know you'll always be served quality food and great sangria.  Garlic potatoes and skirt steak are a must.  Two things to keep in mind
column3: this place is owned by Let Us Entertain You
column4: so if you're expecting quaint mom and pop
column6: the floor tends to get slippery!
